snippet: In only the second surgery of its kind, Mr. Lyles’s cancerous windpipe was replaced in November with a synthetic one that had been seeded with his own cells.
abstract: Christopher Lyles, cancer patient who underwent the second-ever synthetic trachea surgery, dies at age 30.
lead_paragraph: In only the second surgery of its kind, Mr. Lyles’s cancerous windpipe was replaced in November with a synthetic one that had been seeded with his own cells.

headline.seo: Christopher Lyles, Got Synthetic Trachea, Dies at 30
headline.main: Christopher Lyles, Got Synthetic Trachea, Dies at 30
